entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasConversion is not used in the provider value comparer #29406
  • Static value objects causes InvalidOperationException when using the value object instead of primitive type in predicates #29405
  • Porting EF6 to EF Core: error "The LINQ expression could not be translated" reported in lots of queries #29404

Closed

  • Lazy Load Proxy loses the System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NullableAttribute from properties #29391
  • add-migration within VS Package Manager Console hangs due to Debug.Assert() (in own code) #29386
  • Configure an owned entity in order to have one to many relationship with an abstract class #29294
  • Remove-Migration Initialization String validation different from Add-Migration #29290
  • Json: allow customizing (some) serialization options when creating json, so that it's more readable #28815
  • Support for ValueGeneration OnUpdate #12611
  • How to delete the child rows via foreign key without loading navigation property? #29341

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #29289 - don't print JSON_QUERY calls when we extract the entire aggregate #29407
    auto-merge
